LanguageData.Joywire.stages.0.label: Joywire
LanguageData.ArtifactMoodBoost.stages.0.label: Garip duygu
LanguageData.ArtifactMoodBoost.stages.0.description: Garip hissediyorum, ama aynı zamanda çok rahat.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.0.label: psişik yatıştırıcı (orta)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.0.description: Aklımın arkasında sakinleştirici bir ses gibi, sinirlerimi yatıştırıyor, beni sakinleştiriyor.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.1.label: psychic drone (low)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.1.description: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.2.label: psychic drone (medium)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.2.description: I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.3.label: psychic drone (high)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.3.description: Ses dayanılmaz derecede gürültülü. Konsantre olmak zor. Kendimi ona geri cevap verirken buluyorum, bağırıyor. Ama sadece bağırmaya devam ediyor!
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.4.label: psychic drone (extreme)
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.4.description: My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...
